caption.center: RICHARD H. GARRETT, JR., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. WEYERHAEUSER COMPANY,

opinion.opinion_text:
On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal from the August 13, 1999, order of the Court of Appeals, is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
Court of Appeals No. 215775.
